segments.text: Hey ! Ask your mom for more old pictures , OK ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can't it wait ? She's still angry that we sent e-mail wedding invitations .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But we saved your parents so much money ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . And they're spending enough on the plane tickets to Texas !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Speaking of plane tickets , don't forget to check on the reservations !
segments.speaker: S1
